General.Name: Gyldendal A/S
General.Description: Gyldendal A/S publishes and sells books in Denmark. The company publishes fiction and non-fiction books for adults and children, as well as materials for teaching at various levels. It also operates book clubs. Gyldendal A/S was founded in 1770 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

0.Name: Ms. Hanne Gunnel Salomonsen
0.Title: Const. CEO & Member of the Management Board
